item.title: How a small piece of a bathroom door lock helped solve a nurse's murder
item.description: A metal ring, about the size of a quarter, led to Matthew Ecker's murder charge for the death of Alexandra Pennig.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: The Strange Shooting of Alex Pennig
item.description: A nurse is found dead in her apartment. Surveillance video captures her coming home for the last time. Can investigators piece together what happened ...

item.title: 8/9: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Shooter near Emory University campus found dead on second floor of CVS Pharmacy, police say; In an MLB first, woman umpires regular-season game

item.title: 3 hurt in Times Square shooting, 17-year-old arrested, NYPD says
item.description: Three people were hurt in a shooting in Times Square overnight Friday, New York City police say.
